abstract: An abbreviated hour-long edition of “The Biggest Loser” on Tuesday attracted the series’ highest ratings among adults 18 to 49 since its January premiere, helping NBC rank second in that demographic in the 8 p.m. time slot.
snippet: An abbreviated hour-long edition of “The Biggest Loser” on Tuesday attracted the series’ highest ratings among adults 18 to 49 since its January premiere, helping NBC rank second in that demographic in the 8 p.m. time slot.
lead_paragraph: An abbreviated hourlong edition of “The Biggest Loser” on Tuesday attracted the series’ highest ratings among adults 18 to 49 since its January premiere, helping NBC rank second in that demographic in the 8 p.m. time slot.

headline.main: Ratings: A Big Bump for ‘The Biggest Loser’
